QuestData.Title: Arkhaan's Peril
QuestData.Description: Whatever called to him, it cannot have good intentions. We need to go in after him.$b$bBefore we step through this portal, $n... ensure you are prepared to fight. The Void's influence is rarely peaceful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the Void Tear and deal with Arkhaan.
QuestData.RewardText: As I said, the Void's influence is rarely peaceful. We must press on.
